int main()
{
	int t,x,y;
		scanf("%d",&t);
		
		while(t--)
		{
			scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
			
			if(x == 0 || y==0)
			{
			printf("0\n");
			continue;
			}
			
			if(x==y)
			{
				if(x%2==0)
				printf("%d\n",x+1);
				else
				printf("%d\n",x);	
			
				continue;
			}
			
			else
			{
				int hrs=(x/2)+(y/2)+1;
				printf("%d\n",hrs);
			}
			
		}

return 0;
}
